Articles.Content:
And welcome to this Thread.

Playing KSP since a few Months now and iam totally addicted.

First "Contact" was made by randomly browsing youtube and somehow (dont ask how) i ended up @ Scott Manley's Channel. Tried the Demo, fell in love.

What have i achieved:

Lots of Orbits with various Inclinations.

Rover on the Mun

Landed on the Mun

Rover on Minmus

Landed on Minmus

at the Moment im building a Space Station:

Core Module in ORBIT

Docking Module DOCKED

Solar Module DOCKED

Much more to Come.

Greetings and "Fly Safe"

Welcome to the forums!

Glad to hear that you've been enjoying yourself, and nice that you've already managed to do so much!
